Weather.Sunset: Oceancrest is engulfed by the night.
Weather.GlaringSun: Thunderstorms roll in from the bay.
Weather.LightBreeze: A chilly wind sweeps down out of the mountains.
Weather.WindGusts: Powerful gusts of wind blow through the streets of Oceancrest.
Weather.GaleForce: Gale force winds blow in from the bay.
Weather.LightClouds: Light clouds cover the snowy peaks of the mountains.

Weather.Sunset: Oceancrest is engulfed by the night.
Weather.HeavyFog: A heavy fog engulfs the docks of Oceancrest.
Weather.GlaringSun: Waves of blistering heat blow in from the desert.
Weather.LightBreeze: A mild wind sweeps down out of the mountains.
Weather.GaleForce: Gale force winds blow in from the bay.
Weather.LightClouds: Light clouds cover the snowy peaks of the mountains.
